recipe_1.recipe_description: Delight in the classic pasta with flavour-rich tomato sauce
recipe_1.preparation: Boil the pasta, fry the onion and garlic, add the tomato and cook for 10 minutes, add the pasta and mix

recipe_2.recipe_description: Savor the classic American Burger with fries
recipe_2.preparation: Cook the beef, fry the potato, put the beef in the bread with the lettuce, tomato, onion and cheese, serve with the fries

recipe_3.recipe_description: Experience the art of sushi dipped in soy sauce
recipe_3.preparation: Cook the rice, cut the fish, put the rice in the seaweed, add the fish, roll it, cut it, serve with the soy sauce, wasabi and ginger

recipe_4.recipe_description: Treat yourself to the authentic paella with seafood from Spain
recipe_4.preparation: Fry the onion, pepper and garlic, add the tomato, add the rice, add the seafood, cook for 20 minutes

recipe_5.recipe_description: Enjoy the vibrant tacos with home-made guacamole
recipe_5.preparation: Cook the beef, fry the tortilla, put the beef in the tortilla with the lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese and avocado

recipe_6.recipe_description: Savor the flavorful miso ramen with egg and ginger
recipe_6.preparation: Cook the noodles, fry the onion, garlic and ginger, add the soy sauce and miso, add the noodles, add the egg

recipe_7.recipe_description: Experience the exotic couscous with different vegetables
recipe_7.preparation: Cook the couscous, fry the onion and garlic, add the vegetables, cook for 10 minutes

recipe_8.recipe_description: Delight in fluffy American pancakes with syrup
recipe_8.preparation: Mix the flour, milk, egg and sugar, fry the pancakes, serve with the butter and syrup

recipe_9.recipe_description: Savor the aromatic rice curry with chicken and coconut milk
recipe_9.preparation: Cook the rice, fry the onion, garlic and ginger, add the chicken, add the curry and coconut milk, cook for 20 minutes

recipe_10.recipe_description: Indulge in hearty goulash with bread
recipe_10.preparation: Cook the beef, fry the onion, pepper and tomato, add the paprika, add the potato, cook for 30 minutes
